channel.title: blog on Pains.net
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Pains.net

item.title: Migrating from jekyll to Hugo
item.description: Jekyll is great, but I don't love how hard it is to set it up in windows. For the most part I wrote blog posts blind. I've looked for alternatives and settled on Hugo. This is post is about everything that happened during the Jekyll to Hugo conversion.

item.title: Blog Changes
item.description: A round of improvements for this blog occurred. Commenting have been temporarily disabled due to Disqus new policies and SyntaxHighlighter was also replaced with gist for better code snippets and a faster page load.
